platform.title: Platform Name
platform.description: Do not change Platform name!; must be 'HomebridgeVirtualSwitches

SwitchStayOn.title: Check if the switch is to stay on. (be stateful)

Time.title: Time to stay on (in milliseconds)
Time.description: Enter the time (in msec) that the switch must stay on after it was triggered. (Only relevant if switch is not stateful.)

UseLogFile.title: Check if this switch will be triggered by keywords/phrase as they appear live in aon log file

Keywords.title: Keywords to trigger the switch
Keywords.description: Enter the keyword (keyphrase) that will trigger the switch when it appears in the log file

EnableStartupDelay.title: Enable Startup Delay
EnableStartupDelay.description: Check if this switch should not become active until a delay time passed after Homebridge starts.

StartupDelay.title: Startup Delay (in milliseconds)
StartupDelay.description: Enter the time to delay the switch start after Homebridge (re-)starts. (Only relevant if Enable Startup Delay is checked.)
